dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1948
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Briefly summarizes recent Friday night talks at the Catholic Worker on Ireland, worker priests, use of force, and conscientious objection to conscription. Lists many visitors, tells of pleasant days at Maryfarm, and describes conditions in city-run homeless shelters.
